    import React, {useState} from 'react'
import logo from './logo.svg'
import './App.css'

function App() {
  let [title, setTitle] = useState(['ë‚˜ì´í‚¤', 'ì•„ë””ë‹¤ìŠ¤', 'í“¨ë§ˆ']);
  let [thumb, setThumb] = useState([0, 0, 0]);
  return (
    <div>
      {
        title.map(function(e, i) {
          return (
            <div key={i}>
              <h3> { e }
                <span onClick={ () => {
                  var temp = [...thumb];
                  temp[i] = temp[i] + 1;
                  setThumb(temp);
                }}>ğŸ‘</span> { thumb[i] }
              </h3>
            </div>
          )
        })
      }
    </div> 
  )
}

export default App
